General.Name: Chongqing Gas Grp Corp Ltd
General.Description: Chongqing Gas Group Corporation Ltd. engages in the natural gas operation, supply, and installation business in China and internationally. It supplies natural gas to 5.48 million customers. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Chongqing, China.

1.Name: Ms. Jin Yan  Li
1.Title: CFO, Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board of Directors
